event_registry_properties.name: title
po-description
event_registry_properties.item: The number of errors associated with this memory module continues to exceed acceptable levels.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The Solaris Fault Manager has determined that the number of errors reported against a page of physical memory exceeds recommended limits.
event_registry_properties.name: po-response
event_registry_properties.item: An attempt will be made to remove this memory page from service.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: An attempt will be made to remove the affected page of memory from service.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The performance of the system may be minimally impacted as a result of removing the memory page from operation.
event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: No repair action is recommended at this time.
event_registry_properties.name: details
